title: PHOTOS: Stunning images showing London from above
text:
Sunset over London. Looking up the River Thames past Wapping to Tover Bridge, the Shard and the City of London. (Photo: Jason Hawkes/Caters News)

The amazing gallery shows parts of London shot from above — and the views are breathtaking. Jason Hawkes, an aerial photographer from Reading, England, captured the images over the past six months while flying in AS355 helicopters. He said: “The most difficult aspect of shooting aerial views in the U.K. is getting exactly the right kind of lighting. (Caters News)

Photography by Jason Hawkes/Caters News

See more news-related photo galleries and follow us on Yahoo News Photo Twitter and Tumblr.

Aerial view looking along the River Thames with the Shard on one side and the skyscrapers of the City of London. (Photo: Jason Hawkes/Caters News) More

The guards and tourists at Buckingham Palace and Victoria Memorial. (Photo: Jason Hawkes/Caters News) More

The City of London at dusk. (Photo: Jason Hawkes/Caters News) More

The view across St Paul's Cathedral to the Southbank, London Eye and, in the far distance, the cranes at Battersea Power Station and Nine Elms. (Photo: Jason Hawkes/Caters News) More

Aerial view of Wembley Park and Wembley Stadium, Brent, England, with the towers of Central London in the far distance. (Photo: Jason Hawkes/Caters News) More

Dawn over Canary Wharf. (Photo: Jason Hawkes/Caters News) More

Sunset looking through the towers in the City of London with the construction of 22 Bishopsgate. (Photo: Jason Hawkes/Caters News) More
description: The amazing gallery shows parts of London shot from above — and the views are breathtaking. Jason Hawkes, an aerial photographer from Reading, England, captured the images over the past six months while flying in AS355 helicopters.
